description: Maybe it's your life, imagine you are hired for a new job with a new dev team and they develop with Django, but they don't know the right tools for the development with Django. This talk is for you, from a legacy code with no tests, no documentation, no code coverage, I will show you some tools they can help you with this legacy code. Keywords: * `dev-server` * `profiling` * `tests` * `sentry`
title: Pycon Ireland 2017: Django, from nightmare to dream, with good tools - Stephane Wirtel
